result.arabic_text: قَالُواْ ٱطَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَۚ قَالَ طَٰٓئِرُكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تُفۡتَنُونَ
result.translation: Abagarariji bishuye Swalehe bati: “Wewe hamwe n’abinjiye mw’idini ryawe, muraduteye umwaku koko”. Swalehe yaciye abishura ati: “Icobashikira cose, caba iciza canke ikibi, kizoba caragezwe n’Imana Allah kuri mwebwe, ahubwo rero mwebwe muri abantu mugeragezwa ku butunzi no ku bukene, co kimwe no kugeragezwa ku ciza n’ikibi”.
